medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Tall Trees on an Autumn Evening
description: tall mountains in background; two huts at L on mountain bluff; tall trees with a few red leaves and pink highlights on mountain bluff; trees with pink highlights and a few red leaves on rock at lower center
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Col. Peter and Mrs Betty Peabody
